Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local staffDamage = 16
local staffAOE = Vector3.new(20, 20, 20)
local bvTable = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid and myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Staff or rightGrip.Part1 == Staff) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) humanoid:TakeDamage(staffDamage) end end end end end
function fuse(part, hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent ~= part.Parent and hit.Parent ~= vCharacter then local bv = hit:FindFirstChild("StaffBV") local bav = hit:FindFirstChild("StaffBAV") local fire = hit:FindFirstChild("CRFire") if bv or bav or fire then return end bv = part:FindFirstChild("StaffBV") bav = part:FindFirstChild("StaffBAV") fire = part:FindFirstChild("CRFire") if bv then local bvc = bv:Clone() bvc.Parent = hit debris:AddItem(bvc, 1) end if bav then local bavc = bv:Clone() bavc.Parent = hit debris:AddItem(bavc, 1) end if fire then local firec = fire:Clone() firec.Parent = hit debris:AddItem(fire, 1) end end end
function chainReactor() if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end
local animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") if animate then animate.Value = 1 end
local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(myTorso.Position - staffAOE, myTorso.Position + staffAOE), vCharacter, 100) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent then parts[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) fuse(parts[i], hit) end) local tempChar = parts[i].Parent local tempHumanoid = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") tick() if tempHumanoid == nil then local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(100000, 100000, 100000) bv.P = 100000 bv.velocity = (parts[math.random(1, #parts)].Position - parts[i].Position).unit * 10.0 bv.Parent = parts[i] bv.Name = "StaffBV"
local bav = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bav.Name = "StaffBAV" bav.P = 100000 bav.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(1, 10000)/2000, math.random(1, 20000)/2500, math.random(1, 30000)/1500) bav.Parent = parts[i]
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Name = "CRFire" fire.Parent = parts[i] fire.Color = Color3.new(51/255, 51/255, 51/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(204/255, 102/255, 0) fire.Heat = 0 fire.Size = 2 table.insert(bvTable, bv)
else tempHumanoid.Sit = true tempTorso = tempChar:FindFirstChild("Torso") if tempTorso and tempTorso:FindFirstChild("StaffBV") == nil then tempHumanoid:TakeDamage(3 * staffDamage) local count = 10 local targetPart = parts[math.random(1, #parts)] while targetPart.Parent == parts[i].Parent and count > 0 do targetPart = parts[math.random(1, #parts)] count = count - 1 end if targetPart.Parent ~= parts[i].Parent then local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(100000, 100000, 100000) bv.P = 100000 bv.velocity = ((parts[math.random(1, #parts)].Position - tempTorso.Position).unit * 15.0) + Vector3.new(0, 3, 0) bv.Parent = tempTorso bv.Name = "StaffBV"
local bav = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") bav.Name = "StaffBAV" bav.P = 100000 bav.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(math.random(1, 10000)/1000, math.random(1, 20000)/1000, math.random(1, 40000)/1000) bav.Parent = tempTorso
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Name = "CRFire" fire.Parent = parts[i] fire.Color = Color3.new(51/255, 51/255, 51/255) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(204/255, 102/255, 0) fire.Heat = 0 fire.Size = 2 table.insert(bvTable, bv) end end end end end
wait(1.5) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent then local bv = parts[i]:FindFirstChild("StaffBV") local fire = parts[i]:FindFirstChild("CRFire") local bav = parts[i]:FindFirstChild("StaffBAV") if bv then bv:Remove() end if fire then fire:Remove() end if bav then bav:Remove() end end if parts[i].Parent and parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") then local torso = parts[i].Parent.Torso local bv = torso:FindFirstChild("StaffBV") local bav = torso:FindFirstChild("StaffBAV") if bv then bv:Remove() end if bav then bav:Remove() end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
local animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") if animate and animate.Value == 1 then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
chainReactor()
wait(5.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") if animate then animate.Value = 0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Staff.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent local Staff = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid
local animate
local slamAnim local swingAnim
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) if key:lower() == "q" and myHumanoid then animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") swingAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SwingAnim) if swingAnim then swingAnim:Play() end wait(1.0) end end) end end
function onUnequipped() if slamAnim then slamAnim:Stop() end if swingAnim then swingAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") while animate == nil do animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") wait() end
animate.Changed:connect(function() animate = Tool:FindFirstChild("Animate") if animate and animate.Value == 1 and myHumanoid then slamAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlamAnim) if slamAnim then slamAnim:Play() end myHumanoid.Jump = true wait(2.2) animate.Value = 0 end end)
